mapper.insert:
SELECT SEQ_TB_REVIEW.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO TB_REVIEW ( REVIEW_ID, USER_ID, RESTAURANT_ID, REVIEW_RATING, REVIEW_CONTENT, AI_SUMMARY, AI_KEYWORDS, CREATED_DATE, CREATED_ID ) VALUES ( #{reviewId}, #{userId}, #{restaurantId}, #{reviewRating}, #{reviewContent}, #{aiSummary, jdbcType=CLOB}, #{aiKeywords, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSTIMESTAMP, #{createdId} )
mapper.select: SELECT TR.REVIEW_ID, TR.USER_ID, TR.RESTAURANT_ID, TR.REVIEW_RATING, TR.REVIEW_CONTENT, TR.AI_SUMMARY, TR.AI_KEYWORDS, TR.CREATED_DATE, TR.CREATED_ID, TR.UPDATED_DATE, TR.UPDATED_ID, TU.USER_NICKNAME FROM TB_REVIEW TR JOIN TB_USER TU ON TR.USER_ID = TU.USER_ID ORDER BY TR.CREATED_DATE DESC

SELECT TR.REVIEW_ID, TR.USER_ID, TR.RESTAURANT_ID, TR.REVIEW_RATING, TR.REVIEW_CONTENT, TR.AI_SUMMARY, TR.AI_KEYWORDS, TR.CREATED_DATE, TR.CREATED_ID, TR.UPDATED_DATE, TR.UPDATED_ID, TU.USER_NICKNAME FROM TB_REVIEW TR JOIN TB_USER TU ON TR.USER_ID = TU.USER_ID WHERE TR.RESTAURANT_ID = #{restaurantId} ORDER BY TR.CREATED_DATE DESC

SELECT TR.REVIEW_ID, TR.USER_ID, TR.RESTAURANT_ID, TR.REVIEW_RATING, TR.REVIEW_CONTENT, TR.AI_SUMMARY, TR.AI_KEYWORDS, TR.CREATED_DATE, TR.CREATED_ID, TR.UPDATED_DATE, TR.UPDATED_ID, TU.USER_NICKNAME FROM TB_REVIEW TR JOIN TB_USER TU ON TR.USER_ID = TU.USER_ID WHERE TR.RESTAURANT_ID = #{restaurantId} ORDER BY TR.CREATED_DATE DESC FETCH NEXT #{limit} ROWS ONLY

SELECT TR.REVIEW_ID, TR.USER_ID, TR.RESTAURANT_ID, TR.REVIEW_RATING, TR.REVIEW_CONTENT, TR.AI_SUMMARY, TR.AI_KEYWORDS, TR.CREATED_DATE, TR.CREATED_ID, TR.UPDATED_DATE, TR.UPDATED_ID, TU.USER_NICKNAME FROM TB_REVIEW TR JOIN TB_USER TU ON TR.USER_ID = TU.USER_ID WHERE TR.USER_ID = #{userId} ORDER BY TR.CREATED_DATE DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_REVIEW SET REVIEW_RATING = #{reviewRating}, REVIEW_CONTENT = #{reviewContent}, AI_SUMMARY = #{aiSummary, jdbcType=CLOB}, AI_KEYWORDS = #{aiKeywords, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATED_DATE = SYSTIMESTAMP, UPDATED_ID = #{updatedId} WHERE REVIEW_ID = #{reviewId}
mapper.select: SELECT REVIEW_ID, USER_ID, RESTAURANT_ID, REVIEW_RATING, REVIEW_CONTENT, AI_SUMMARY, AI_KEYWORDS, CREATED_DATE, CREATED_ID, UPDATED_DATE, UPDATED_ID FROM TB_REVIEW WHERE REVIEW_ID = #{reviewId}
